case.title: CUTE & READY TO MEET IN QUEENS? DRINKS TONIGHT! - 30 (Queens)
case.text:
Hi Queens Ladies,
If you clicked then you're ready for a romantic drink in Queens tonight with this extremely cute Italian-Spanish guy!
So what are we waiting for? The night's young!
Please be fun, attractive (in-shape pls) and great company, between 21 and 35, and open to more than just a drink if the mood strikes us. Shoot me an email (with your town in queens in the subject) including your PIC (please make it a good one - lol) , age, ethnicity/race, astrological sign and favorite drinking spot in the area.
Sorry I'm not attracted to black or fat/thick girls. All others welcome to reply!
I'll be waiting...ciao
